div.span: Adapted from Inventory of Greek Coin Hoards

div.pre: 243 Peloponnesus?, before 1940 Burial: 175-150 B.C. (T) Contents: 105 AR Phocis: 8 triob. Carystus: 1 dr. Chalcis: 14 dr. Histiaea: 5 tetrob. Achaean League: 50 triob. Sicyon: 8 triob. Elis: 1 dr. Argos: 6 triob. Arcadian League: 10 triob. Rhodes: 2 triob. Disposition: Athens Information from M. Oeconomides See no. 260 below (Noe 802)
